body:
In accordance with the continued efforts to promote the touristic, archaeological and cultural Potentials of Fayoum, the Governorate in collaboration with the Ministry of Tourism and Antiquities cordially invite you to attend the event of Qasr Qarun Sun Festival, a spectacular event occurs just once a year at the Temple of Qasr Qarun in Fayoum, known as the â€˜Wonder of the Sunâ€™, every December 21st, the sunâ€™s rays beam down inside the Temple, which is usually shrouded in darkness, then lights up the inner Temple as if by magic.
The Temple was once the sanctuary for the God Sobek and an important place of worship, the date marks the start of the â€˜Winter Solsticeâ€™ and is a wonderful reminder of the earthâ€™s unique phenomenon.
Qasr Qarun temple is located to the southwestern side of Lake Qaroun; it dates back to the Greco-Roman Era. The Temple is also in the vicinity of the Protectorates of Wadi Al- Rayan, Wadi Al-Hitan (The valley of the whales) and Tunis Village, this rare and unique architectural and astronomical phenomenon is as important as the same phenomenon that happens in Abu Simpel in Aswan.
The archaeological site will start welcoming guests for free at 6:00 am. The unique phenomena will start at 6:45 am and will last for 20 minutes. There will be guided tours to get more info about this well preserved temple in Fayoum.
